command.name: feedback
command.description: [Beta] You can submit feedback for improving service.

item-1.label: Please enter a brief topic or title.

item-2.label: Please describe the feedback in detail.
item-2.placeholder: (Hate speech such as slang and racism can be punished.)

embed-user.title: > 💌 Feedback
embed-user.description: Sent you feedback/suggestion as below. Thank you for using it. 🙏

command.name: guide
command.description: Check out the guide for the OP.GG Esports bot.

embed-page_1.title: > 📌 OP.GG Esports Discord Bot Guide
embed-page_1.footer: TIP: You can turn the page by clicking the button below.

field_1.name: ▫️ Infomations
field_1.value: This bot is the official bot for the [OP.GG Esports](https://esports.op.gg/) service and provides Esports League-related features of **League of Legends**.

field_2.name: ▫️ Functions
field_2.value: Basically, it provides Esports schedule inquiry and game notification of League of Legends, but you can enjoy the league more through the match prediction minigame.

field_3.name: ▫️ Support Server
field_3.value: [OP.GG Server](https://discord.com/invite/opgg/) to communicate with users and check out information on OP.GG Esports bots and other services!

field_4.name: ▫️ Invite Bot
field_4.value: Try the OP.GG Esports bot [RIGHT NOW!]({url}) 😆

embed-page_2.title: > 📌 OP.GG Esports Discord Bot Guide
embed-page_2.footer: TIP: You can turn the page by clicking the button below.

field_1.name: /schedule
field_1.value: Check the league schedule of League of Legends Esports.

field_2.name: /standing
field_2.value: Check the season team rankings of League of Legends Esports.

field_3.name: /banpick
field_3.value: Check out the ban/pick rankings of League of Legends Esports.

field_4.name: /bestplayer
field_4.value: Check out who is the season MVP of League of Legends Esports.

field_5.name: /player
field_5.value: Search for player information in League of Legends Esports.

embed-page_3.title: > 📌 OP.GG Esports Discord Bot Guide
embed-page_3.footer: TIP: You can turn the page by clicking the button below.

field_1.name: /guide
field_1.value: Send a guide for using OP.GG Esports bot.

field_2.name: /service-register
field_2.value: Let's proceed with the basic settings for using the service.

field_3.name: /service-quit
field_3.value: Leave the service and delete the data.

field_4.name: /my-profile
field_4.value: Check the user profile information in the service.

field_5.name: /feedback
field_5.value: [Beta] You can submit feedback or suggestions for OP.GG Esports bots.

embed-page_4.title: > 📌 OP.GG Esports Discord Bot Guide
embed-page_4.footer: TIP: You can turn the page by clicking the button below.

field_1.name: /settings-setup
field_1.value: Let's proceed with the initial server setup for using the service.

field_2.name: /settings-change
field_2.value: Change the options in the service settings.

field_3.name: /settings-league
field_3.value: Set only the league you want to receive notifications.

embed-page_5.title: > 📌 OP.GG Esports Discord Bot Guide
embed-page_5.footer: TIP: You can turn the page by clicking the button below.

field_1.name: ▫️ What's the Prediction Minigame?
field_1.value: You can enjoy the league more by betting on your points by predicting the victory or defeat of the league match.

field_2.name: ▫️ How can I enjoy it?
field_2.value:
The betting field opens at the start of each game, and the betting closes 15 minutes later.

And the results of the match prediction will be sent along with the results of the match after the match.
